name: Potato Revenge (immortalbrick)
description:
Strange creatures broke into your farm and stole your potatoes. You take your shotgun and go after them to get potatoes back.

A first-person shooter created for My First Game Jam: Summer 2019.

Authors: Paweł Gąska, Paweł Bąk.

Tools:

- Unity

- Blender

- GIMP

- Bosca Ceoil

Rock assets come from LowPoly Rocks package https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/lowpoly-rocks-137970
